body_content.explanation: the activity of writing books, articles, etc. for another person to publish under their own name:
examples: He had commissioned the ghosting of his autobiography.
Ghosting is a new direction for an established author.

body_content.explanation: a way of ending a relationship with someone suddenly by stopping all communication with them:
examples: It feels terrible to be a victim of ghosting.
Ghosting is one break-up trend that I will never understand.

body_content.explanation: the appearance of a copy of an image over the top of the original image, without covering it exactly, especially on a screen or photograph:
examples: There were no common defects like streaking and ghosting with this screen.
The slow exposure time resulted in blurring and ghosting.
